component.name: drumstick-guiplayer
component.summary: Simple MIDI file player based on ALSA Sequencer

description.p: Simple MIDI file player for .MID (Standard MIDI Files), .RMI (RIFF RMID) and .WRK (Cakewalk) files based on the ALSA Sequencer.
This program is an example of the Drumstick libraries. For a fully featured MIDI file player see: dmidiplayer.sourceforge.io
